Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Repeals section 259-j of the executive law relating to the discharging of a person's sentence by the board of parole
Summary: Repeals provisions relating to the discharging of a person's sentence by the board of parole.
ActClause: AN ACT to repeal certain provisions of the executive law relating to the discharging of a person's sentence by the board of parole
